favourite.article: Praise the Lord! We are one in Christ. No matter where and who we are. We are all one in Christ. Although Satan may tried and tried to seperate us, yet we are still one in Christ.
Praise the Lord that all the saints can all be one when we are in Christ! For we are His Body and He is our Head!
What a glorious church life, Christ in us has made us one, Eating the tree of life.
It is a very rhythmic and pleasant song.
